CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 12, 1941, pg. 18, reads: "Bathing Beauties Who Won Top Honors at Pittsburgh's B. P. A. Picnic - Many Attend BPA Picnic on Fourth - The fourth annual picnic of the Business and Professional Men's Association at South Park on the Fourth of July..."Cutline for related image and article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 23, 1941, pg. 9. reads: "BATHING BEAUTIES TO BE HOSTESSES - These bathing beauties will be hostesses to the Trade Week Prom at St. Moritz hall, September 10, a feature of Trade Week sponsored by the Business and Professional Association."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of beauty contestants, possibly including Bea Williams on left, Jean Johnson eleventh from right, Ernestine Holloway ninth from right, and Ruth Sharpe Barnett sixth from right, holding numbered cards and wearing bathing suits and sashes reading "...Cardwell Dawson, ...Clothes, ...Hotel, ...Walker, ...Hawkins," at Sully's pool in South Park for Business and Professional Men's Association picnic
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--South Park.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--South Park.Bathing suits--Pennsylvania--South Park.Beauty contests--Pennsylvania--South Park.Allegheny County (Pa.).Department of Parks, Recreation, and Conservation.South Park.
